display: Engine Lubrication >> Pressure, Vacuum and Temperature (Specifications)
title: Pressure, Vacuum and Temperature
content:
At Curb Idle Speed* .................... 68.9 kPa (10 psi)
At 3000 rpm .................... 310 - 517 kPa (45 - 75 psi)

CAUTION: * If pressure is ZERO at curb Idle, DO NOT run engine at 3,000 rpm.
